page.title: 20THE FUTURE
page.content: We think that tractors will be more powerful and faster at thier work. We think less people will be ill because there will be more technology and there will be more pipes under-ground fitted by gasmen. Transport will be cheaper and so will petrol,and we think that the population of the world will get bigger by the minute.Schools will be full of computers and not so many teachers.There will not be so many rain forests and rare animals will only be seen in captivity.Many people will go into space and visit the moon, Mars, Pluto and our galaxy.Telephones will have little gaps in the middle for televisions.
